head.script: var clicker; var t = 3600; $(document).ready(function () { var url = location.href; if (url == "http://www.mytilebacksplash.com/#" || url == "http://www.mytilebacksplash.com" || url == "http://www.mytilebacksplash.com/?theme=130" || url == "http://www.mytilebacksplash.com/" || url == "www.mytilebacksplash.com/#" || url == "http://www.mytilebacksplash.com/index.aspx" || url == "www.mytilebacksplash.com" || url == "mytilebacksplash.com" || url == "http://mytilebacksplash.com" || url == "www.mytilebacksplash.com/?theme=130") { $(".page-column-left").hide(); } $(function () { $('#navMenu').find('> li').hover(function () { $(this).find('ul').removeClass('noJS').stop(true, true).slideToggle('fast'); }); }); $(".show-cart-btn").bind('click', clickHandler); }); function clickHandler(evt) { $(".show-cart-btn").unbind('click'); var cart = $('table.cart-module-cart').html(); var bd = $("table.cart-module-cart .mod-box").html(); $(".custom-cart tbody").remove(); $(".custom-cart").prepend($('table.cart-module-cart').html()); $(".custom-cart table.cart-module-cart").append(bd); if (clicker) { clearTimeout(clicker); } clicker = setTimeout(function () { close(); }, t); if ($(".custom-cart").hasClass("expand") == true) { $(".custom-cart").removeClass("expand"); } else { $(".custom-cart").addClass("expand"); } $(".custom-cart").slideToggle("fast", function () { $(".show-cart-btn").bind('click', clickHandler); }) } function close() { if ($(".custom-cart").hasClass('expand')) { $(".custom-cart").removeClass("expand"); $(".custom-cart").slideToggle("fast"); clearTimeout(clicker); } }

b:widget.title: Navbar

a.onclick: var nonwin=navigator.appName!='Microsoft Internet Explorer'?'yes':'no'; var certheight=screen.availHeight-90; window.open(this.href,'shopperapproved','location='+nonwin+',scrollbars=yes,width=620,height='+certheight+',menubar=no,toolbar=no'); return false;

img.oncontextmenu: var d = new Date(); alert('Copying Prohibited by Law - This image and all included logos are copyrighted by shopperapproved \251 '+d.getFullYear()+'.'); return false;
